name: "I'd Rather Lose Money Myself..." (In Effect)
description: Every time your opponent gains 2 Elemental Dice during this Round: You gain 1 Omni Element. (Elemental Die provided by this effect are excluded)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Every time your opponent gains 2 Elemental Dice during this Round</color>: You gain 1 $[K411]. (Elemental Die provided by this effect are excluded)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Every time your opponent gains 2 Elemental Dice during this Round</color>: You gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>. (Elemental Die provided by this effect are excluded)
